rows.label: qev095102_MSG0002
rows.name: Someone there? Why have you come?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095102_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you came to save them from the Prone.

rows.label: qev095102_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask if he is being forced to work for the Prone.

rows.label: qev095102_MSG0003
rows.name: Rescue us from Prone? But that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095102_MSG0004
rows.name: Er, never mind. Just get us out of building![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095102_MSG0006
rows.name: We are prisoners. Forced to labor long hours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095102_MSG0007
rows.name: When not working, we are locked in here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev095102_MSG0008
rows.name: Door is strong. It cannot be destroyed.[ST:wait ]
